feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added countdown of sleep cycle in log - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/217 (Cycle countdown clock #217)
  • Added a reset button to homepage for apps to reset cycles manually - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/215 ([Feature Request] Manual Cycle trigger #215)

  • update by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/303
  • Merge pull request #302 from plexguide/dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/304
  • B097 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/305
  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/306

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.2.15...6.2.16

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.19
entry.content: Had to revert back to 6.2.19 - Attempt to fix drop down but it broke logs in the process. Minor fixes will be fixed up in 6.2.20 with the drop downs requiring another solution.

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.20
entry.content:
• Fixed issue - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/321 (Error during Swaparr processing for Ebooks: 'str' object has no attribute 'get)
  • Fixed issue - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/312 (radarr: refresh_movie() takes 4 positional arguments but 6 were given)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.21
entry.content:
• Modified code to help mobile users or users having issue with the navigation
  • Fixed swapper dictionary issues and issues with Whisparr v3
  • Apps finally use the centralized settings, some kept using hardcode variables (old)
